entry.tran: 自我剥夺的;自我牺牲的;克己忘我的
entry.def: Someone who is self-denying refuses to do or have things that they would like, either because they cannot afford them, or because they believe it is morally good for them not to do them or have them.

example.ex: They believed that good parents should be self-sacrificing and self-denying...
example.tran: 他们认为好的父母应该牺牲自我，一心为孩子着想。

example.ex: They belong to an older, more self-denying generation.
example.tran: 他们属于更加克己的上一代人。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
